name: Quick Bites
description:
Game Info

     The game quick bites with Made in under an hour (roughly 56 minutes). It was a which challenge for me to do while working on some other bigger projects. Kind of showing that I'm Not Dead. Thanks for checking it out and post your highest "Time Left" in the comments down below. Thanks & have a good day.

Game Controls

     Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around. Use space to instantly stop, & control to accelerate faster. Try to get to the blue squares and avoid the red squares. Try to get the highest "time left" possible & share your high score down below.
